Literature.Title: Small Peptides Derived from Penetratin as Antibacterial Agents.
Literature.Author: Parravicini O, et al.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>50µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>50µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>50µg/ml),Yersinia enterocolitica(MIC=>50µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=>50µg/ml),Salmonella sp.(MIC=>50µg/ml)
